ca.utoronto.utm.paint

类 Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Shape
        • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Square

  • public class Square
extends Shape
    Subclass of Shape, which creates a square object with two opposite corners at first click and the last.
    作者:
    Haoran Xiao

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Square(Point start, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, javafx.scene.shape.StrokeType stroke)
      Constructor of the outline of a square
      Square(Point start, javafx.scene.paint.Color colour, javafx.scene.shape.StrokeType stroke, java.lang.Boolean filled, boolean outlined, int thickness, javafx.scene.paint.Color outlineColor)
      Another constructor with more detailed attribute of a square

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void calcPoints(Point p)
      This method updates the point of a square, which allows the user to draw the square from different directions and if the user drags the square into an rectangle, it will be rounds to the nearest square.
      void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
      an override method from Shape, which draws the square according to different conditions, outlined, filled, etc.
      double getSide() 
      Point getStartpt() 
      void setSide(double s)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Square

        public Square(Point start,
              javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
              javafx.scene.shape.StrokeType stroke)
        Constructor of the outline of a square
        参数:
        start - initial point of the square
        color - color of the square
        stroke - strokeType of the square

      • Square

        public Square(Point start,
              javafx.scene.paint.Color colour,
              javafx.scene.shape.StrokeType stroke,
              java.lang.Boolean filled,
              boolean outlined,
              int thickness,
              javafx.scene.paint.Color outlineColor)
        Another constructor with more detailed attribute of a square
        参数:
        start - initial point of the square
        colour - color of the fill of square
        stroke - strokeType of the square
        filled - whether the square is filled
        outlined - whether the square has outline
        thickness - thickness of the outline of the square
        outlineColor - outline color of the square

      • calcPoints

        public void calcPoints(Point p)
        This method updates the point of a square, which allows the user to draw the square from different directions and if the user drags the square into an rectangle, it will be rounds to the nearest square.
        指定者:
        calcPoints 在类中 Shape
